org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction

Class SecuritySettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction.SecuritySettings

  • public class SecuritySettings
extends java.lang.Object
    A class dedicated to managing the security settings involved in managing secure sessions.

    The object provides default values when instantiated, they can be modified with the putKeyInfo method.

    The getKeyInfo method returns the specified setting value.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SecuritySettings.DefaultKeyInfo
      List of key information that can be provided when the secure session is created.

        public SecuritySettings()

        Initialize default values

    • Method Detail

      • setAuthorizedKvcList

        public void setAuthorizedKvcList(java.util.List<java.lang.Byte> authorizedKvcList)
        Provides a list of authorized KVC If this method is not called, the list will remain empty and all KVCs will be accepted. If a list is provided and a PO with a KVC not belonging to this list is presented, a KeypleCalypsoSecureSessionUnauthorizedKvcException will be raised.
        Parameters:
        authorizedKvcList - the list of authorized KVCs

      • isAuthorizedKvc

        public boolean isAuthorizedKvc(byte kvc)
        CHeck if the provided kvc value is authorized or not.

        If no list of authorized kvc is defined (authorizedKvcList null), all kvc are authorized.

        Parameters:
        kvc - to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the kvc is authorized
